subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Brandon Morrow pitched a shutout and Toronto, a day after a 14-5 shellacking of the Mets, scored two runs off Jeremy Hefner, who had been called up from the minors earlier in the day.
snippet: Brandon Morrow pitched a shutout and Toronto, a day after a 14-5 shellacking of the Mets, scored two runs off Jeremy Hefner, who had been called up from the minors earlier in the day.
